items.sentence: Tom will eventually do that, but probably not anytime soon.
Tom will try to find out why Mary did that the way she did.
Tom wasn\'t able to find a babysitter on such short notice.
Tom got jealous when he saw Mary talking to a handsome guy.
Tom has been to this park with Mary at least a dozen times.
Tom is the only student in our class that can speak French.
Tom knew it was a possibility that Mary would show up late.
What Tom really wanted to do was stay at home and watch TV.
What are Tom and Mary going to wear to the Halloween party?
What you need to do next is fill out this application form.
